scripts.dev: concurrently -n SERVER,CLIENT -c auto "npm --prefix server run dev" "npm --prefix client run dev"
scripts.install:all: npm i && npm --prefix server i && npm --prefix client i
scripts.render-build: npm --prefix server i && npm --prefix server run build && npm --prefix client i && npm --prefix client run build
